column1: Funeral service will be conducted by the Rev. Jim Loftis at 12:00 PM Monday June 22
column3: 2013 in the Bumgardner Chapel of McLean Funeral Directors of Belmont. Interment will be in Gaston Memorial Park. The family will receive friends for one hour (11AM-12PM) prior to the service at McLean Funeral Directors of Belmont.
